about_the_game:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass 3. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

An additional costume for Yue Jin "Knight Costume" will be available for use.

▼How to use the content
From the title screen, select Gallery - Characters, and then select Yue Jin. From Change Costume, select Regular Costume.
Alternatively, proceed to a Hideaway while playing the game, select Change Costume, select Yue Jin, and then select the costume.
Note: To select Yue Jin, you must have progressed the game to a point in which the character can be selected as a character.

Note: A content set that includes this DLC is also available. Please see the official site for details. ()
detailed_description:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass 3. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

An additional costume for Yue Jin "Knight Costume" will be available for use.

▼How to use the content
From the title screen, select Gallery - Characters, and then select Yue Jin. From Change Costume, select Regular Costume.
Alternatively, proceed to a Hideaway while playing the game, select Change Costume, select Yue Jin, and then select the costume.
Note: To select Yue Jin, you must have progressed the game to a point in which the character can be selected as a character.

Note: A content set that includes this DLC is also available. Please see the official site for details. ()

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
